clusterName.description: The name for cluster where the collectors and target allocator are deployed, required when enablePrometheus set to true

clusterId.description: The uid of kube-system namespace, required when helm lookup is not supported and enablePrometheus/selfTelemetry is set to true

install.description: Install flag for Otel, 'true' will install/upgrade it, 'false' will not install/uninstall it

enablePrometheus.description: Enable the prometheus related deployment, it will deploy a target allocator and change collector replica mode to be statfulset.

setPodUID.description: setPodUID when set to true will set pod uid to the collector self-telemetry resrouce.

targetAllocatorServiceAccount.description: ServiceAccount for target allocator, only enable when enablePrometheus equals true, disable it by setting create to false.

enable.description: whether the tail sampling collector should be deployed, default false. Tail sampling collector will be deployed automatically when presets.tailsampler.enable set to true and this config will be ignored.

os.description: The operating system that tail sampling collector should be deployed, [linux] by default. If you also want to deploy tail sampling collector to windows, you could change it to [linux, windows]

config.description: OpenTelemetry Collector Configuration. It is the recommended way to set the collector config. If spec.config is set, this property won't take effect. Refer to the OpenTelemetry Collector documentation for details.

enable.description: Whether tail sampling should be used, default to false

deploy_mode.description: How tail sampling should be deployed, for now only gateway_sampler is available, which means the default gateway_sampler will receive the trace and forward to tail sampling collector for sampling

replicas.description: The number of tail sampling collector should be deployed.

service.description: The tail sampling collector service configs

name.description: The name of the tail sampling collector, default to be appdynamics-otel-collector-sampler-service

pipeline.description: The trace processor pipeline for the tail sampling collector, this is where the user can drop or add a certain sampler

exporters.description: exporters for self telemetry, default otlphttp: {}. By default self telemetry is sent with other metrics together to AppDynamics, the user may add or replace the exporters here to let the self telemetry be sent to other places. Note when a exporter with empty config need to be added, please use {} as value, for example logging: {} instead of logging: null or just logging:

disableOpamp.description: disable agent management extension communication. By setting this to true, the user can enable agent management extension without connecting it with the platform, the collector can still report self telemetry by setting agentManagementSelfTelemetry to true

agentManagementSelfTelemetry.description: Enable agent management extension based self telemetry, it will report the same set of metrics by enabling selfTelemetry, but it will have different resource attribute and use different solution

enableNetworkMonitoring.description: enable the Network Monitoring related receiver & processors

customService.description: A custom service which its name and namespace can be configured for user application. Note that the default service name, i.e. appdynamics-otel-collector-service, is used by other AppDynamics collectors and shall not be changed

enable.description: Whether the custom service will be created, false by default

name.description: The name for the custom service

namespace.description: The namespace for the custom service
